lines.text: Contribution to Provident and Other Funds
Excluding leave encashment and gratuity liability._
Monetary value of the perquisite have been evaluated as per Income Tax Rules, wherever necessary.
In view of the accumulated losses, no commission is payable to Directors/ Managing Director and hence, computation of Net
Profit in accordance with Section 349 of the Act has not been given.
Reimbursement of expenses (including service tax of
29) 'Interest and Commitment charges' includes Rs.4,69,88,452 (Previous year Rs.7,33, 14,233) being interest and commitment charges
30) The amount of exchange difference (net) debited to the Profit and Loss Account : Rs.3, 12,191 (Previous Year Rs. 8,42,291).
31) Loans & Advances include interest free advance receivable from Employee Co-operative Society Rs.2,96,275 (Previous Year Rs.5,86,740)
[Maximum outstanding during the year Rs. 14,75,000 (Previous Year Rs. 14,46,830)] through which the employees of the Company get
loans as per the policy of the Society
32) ADDITIONAL INFORMATION PURSUANT TO THE PROVISIONS OF PARAGRAPHS 3, 4C AND 4D OF PART II OF SCHEDULE VI
A. Information in respect of Sales :
Sales include transfer for own consumption
. Information in respect of goods manufactured : (as certified by the management)
Licensed capacity is exclusive of concessions, either through enactment or by notification.
Installed capacity is on the basis of three shifts working, as certified by the Management and being a technical matter, relied upon by
Actual production of Cigarettes include production for own consumption.
The difference in quantities is on account of breakages/wastages/damages/ unserviceability.
